Detailed Description

Demo of DH Key Exchange with projective points.

Author:
Graham Enos
This is a sample file that makes use of the classes and methods in b_projective.cc and b_edwards.cc to conduct a DH key exchange demonstration.

Function Documentation

int main ( int  argc,
char *  argv[] 
)

A quick key exchange demo.

This function shows how to use our projective points on a Binary Edwards Curve to conduct a Diffie-Hellman key exchange.

Our irred. polynomial is x^163 + x^7 + x^6 + x^3 + 1, per FIPS 186-3

more compact output

a6 = b in Fips 186-3 language

Weierstrass params; need to be changed to Edwards Curve

Seeding pseudorandom generator

Bob's first steps

Alice reconstructs private key

Bob does the same
